overview:
Ernie brings 30 years of television experience to WineTasteTV. For the past 15 years he has worked in a strategic development role for TEAM and now serves as its President. Recently he launched the ChannelWorksTV division of TEAM and developed MyPathTV, a destination Internet TV channel for the mind, body, spirit audience. Under his direction, TEAM has played critical roles in the launch of numerous cable channels such as Animal Planet, Discovery Health Channel, BBC America and TVOne. Along the way, TEAM has amassed an impressive array of industry recognition ranging from national Emmys to Promax/BDA awards.

Source: WineTastetv.com
